name: Self Destruct
description:
CONTROLS

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

SPACE - EXPLODE!

Blow the competition away in this fun arcade game about explosions!

This game was made in 3 days for the NOKIA3310 Game Jam 2 2020, the theme was:  

DEATH IS GOOD

So in this game, to kill your enemies, you self destruct!

Written in javascript using my own library :)
